title: I, Leonardo Da Vinci
creator_credit: Helen J. Rogers, John H. Secondari, American Broadcasting Company and Paramount Theater Productions
brief_description: Traces the life story of the great Renaissance man and the enormous influence of his ideas and innovations on the intellectual history of the Western World…as a painter, sculptor, architect, musician, engineer and scientist.
